name: Lion
description: The lion is a majestic big cat known for its strength and courage.

name: Elephant
description: The elephant is a massive, herbivorous mammal with a long trunk and large ears.

name: Giraffe
description: The giraffe is a tall, long-necked animal known for its distinctive spotted coat.

name: Tiger
description: The tiger is a powerful and solitary big cat known for its striking orange coat with black stripes.

name: Penguin
description: The penguin is a flightless bird known for its waddling walk and black-and-white plumage.

name: Dolphin
description: The dolphin is a highly intelligent marine mammal known for its playful behavior.

name: Kangaroo
description: The kangaroo is a marsupial with powerful hind legs used for hopping and carrying young in a pouch.

name: Cheetah
description: The cheetah is the fastest land animal, capable of reaching speeds up to 60-70 miles per hour.

name: Hippopotamus
description: The hippopotamus is a large, aquatic mammal with a massive body and large jaws.

name: Gorilla
description: The gorilla is the largest primate and is known for its immense strength and gentle nature.
